floatingpoint.livemetadecks.hardwareui
Class HwTabbedPage

java.lang.Object
  floatingpoint.livemetadecks.hardwareui.HwComponent
      floatingpoint.livemetadecks.hardwareui.HwPage
          floatingpoint.livemetadecks.hardwareui.HwTabbedPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
IComponentChangeListener
public class HwTabbedPage
extends HwPage
implements IComponentChangeListener

A Page that holds a list of other pages. Only one of these tab pages is active at a time. A button is automatically supplied for each page that is added. This button will toggle the corresponding page to be the active page. When creating a HwTabbedPage, the number of slots that it will occupy must be supplied in the constructor. Remember to allocate enough slots for the tabButtons that are added for each tab page. So, for example, if you want a HwTabbedPage that has 10 slots that are shared by the tab pages and will have 4 pages, then you must allocate 14 slots in the constructor.

Author:
floatingpoint

HwTabbedPage

                    java.lang.String name,
                    int numTabs)
Parameters:
numSlots - The total number of slots that the HwTabbedPage will occupy. This includes the buttons that switch the tabs. So for example if you want a HwTabbedPage to hold 4 tabs of 10 components the total number of slots required is 14.

setActivePage

public void setActivePage(int pageIndex)

redraw

public void redraw()
Updates the view of all slots under this Page's control. for a tabbed page this means that the active page is redrawn and the tab switching buttons are redrawn.

Overrides:
redraw in class HwPage

getNumTabSlots

private int getNumTabSlots()
Gets the number of slots that are available for the tabs. So this is all slots less the number of tab switching buttons.

Returns:
Gets the number of slots that are available for tabs.

getNumTabs

private int getNumTabs()
Returns:
The number of tabs that this HwTabbedPage has.

updateChildComponent

protected void updateChildComponent(HwComponent childComponent,
                                    int childSlotToUpdate,
                                    java.lang.Object newValue)
Description copied from class: HwPage
This function gets called by a child of this HwComponent that wishes to have itself redrawn. childSlotToUpdate is the slot *in the child* that needs to be updated. This is not to be confused with the slot on this component that the child slot occupies.

Overrides:
updateChildComponent in class HwPage
Parameters:
childComponent - The child HwComponent of this HwComponent that needs to be redrawn.
childSlotToUpdate - The slot in the child that needs to be updated.
newValue - The value that should be drawn.
See Also:
HwPage.updateChildComponent(floatingpoint.livemetadecks.hardwareui.HwComponent, int, java.lang.Object)
